thread.title: Bubbles key to disease prevention, medicine delivery, and cutting naval costs, says scientist

title: Bubbles key to disease prevention, medicine delivery, and cutting naval costs, says scientist
text:
Bubbles key to disease prevention, medicine delivery, and cutting naval costs, says scientist 3:24pm BST - 01:01 
The science of bubbles may be key to delivering medicine to hard-to-reach areas, preventing deadly diseases, and saving navies world-wide hundreds of millions of dollars. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The science of bubbles may be key to delivering medicine to hard-to-reach areas, preventing deadly diseases, and saving navies world-wide hundreds of millions of dollars. Jim Drury reports.
